stealth.summary: Hiding and evasion let the player survive encounters with revealed or suspicious crew by using darkness, cover, and timing instead of open conflict.

crafting.summary: Combining scavenged tools into improvised gear should be data-driven, feed the event bus, and reward planning over raw stats.

recipes.name: Makeshift Torch
recipes.description: A wired lantern bundled for stealth sweeps.

recipes.name: Improvised Spear
recipes.description: A sharpened handle wrapped with wire for close-quarters defense.

endings.summary: Multiple endings should surface through events so UI layers can react without being coupled to win/lose checks.
